beer.beer_description:
Secret Spices + Roasted Apricots + Wild Yeast

We love nothing better than Belgian-style saison but with this blissful version we’ve added our own Wild interpretation of the style by adding a dash of funky Brettanomyces yeast plus roasted apricots and a hush-hush blend of spices. All of this makes for an extraordinary beer with an array of aromas that leap out of the glass followed by a spicy, fruity, tart and peppery palate and a long lingering finish.

Bliss can be drunk fresh or left to age when it becomes drier and more complex as the Brett (the yeast not our brewer!) gets to work in the bottle. This is the sort of beer where study and contemplation is essential.

50kg of roasted apricots went into the boil with more added to the fermentor as well as our blend of spices.

items.badge_description: There's beer in them thar hills! You're setting off on your journey through the world of beer, but be sure to take a little time to get to know each brewery as you go. That's a beer from 265 different breweries. Try 5 more for Level 54!

You have a keen taste for this Belgian masterpiece. Did you know the Saison style beer was invented by Belgian farms, brewed in the Winter and served the Spring/Summer to all their workers? Well now you do! That’s 45 different Farmhouse Ales! Try 5 more for Level 10.

user.bio: Field Service Tech for a Bottle Inspection company (fill level, cap inspection) love beer,travelling and meeting people.

user.bio: Crawley born. Norfolk emigre. If it’s beer it’ll most likely get a score over 4.

items.checkin_comment: Fall season spices abound, perhaps cardamom, nutmeg, cinnamon. It’s good but probably my least favorite of the 4 or so different Wilds I’ve had. Not getting much apricot. Perhaps the spices overpower the fruit.

user.bio: Me so hoppy. IPA lot when I’m tipsy. Sip happens.

items.badge_description: It's time to give bottle shops some love by adding them as your purchased location. That's 155 check-ins with a purchased location! Tag 5 more to get to Level 32. Want to learn more about this badge? Check out our podcast

Looking for more kick than a session beer, but want to be able to stay for a few rounds? You have to keep it in the middle. That's 455 beers with an ABV greater than 5% and less than 10%.  Try 5 more for Level 92!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 230 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 47!

items.checkin_comment: This has aged beautifully.. Heady Spice funky Apricots, subtle tingle of acidity..

items.badge_description: Thanks for staying at home, and checking in with Untappd! It allows us to stay connected to a community of beer lovers, just like you, even if we can't be in the same physical location. From our home to yours, cheers and stay safe!
99 bottles of beer on the wall, 99 bottles of beer. Take one down, pass it around.... That's 265 checkins with the serving style of Bottle. Try 5 more for Level 54!

items.badge_description: While a pint of traditional English ale will always remain a staple, the craft beer scene in England, much like the rest of the world, has continued to grow at a rapid rate! That's 315 different beers from a brewery from England! Try 5 more for Level 64!
